1.name: HRB
1.description: used to keep the connection alive

2.name: CMD
2.description: used to send messages to the client

3.name: ACK
3.description: used to acknowledge message recieved to the server

6.name: CMD
6.description: Push a command directly to the turtle

7.name: ENQ
7.description: States that a command(s) was enqueued.
